subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Who's the brainiac!?
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
--0-1460414566-1197089415=:60604
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

LOL well ya remember the last time Frank...its a mad dash...a few ooo's and ahhh's....then everyone settles down and starts to work together (HOPEFULLY!!!!) and new ideas are born.
   
  hehehe it just makes ya nervous when theres 1000 emails in the inbox and you cant answer everyone. But yeah flip it off again if ya need the break. Dont get overwhelmed. Plenty of other guys here who can answer peoples questions or try to help them find the answer on thier own.
   
  I try...but there is just not enough free time in my day to reply to all of my email/posts etcetera. I do alot of speedreading and listen to alot of files at once to catch up but that usually takes up the free minutes and then its off to work/bed
   
  So just do what ya can, and if you start overdoing it, flip that sucker off for a week LOL
   
  Misty

Dreams N Chains <dreams_n_chains@...> wrote:
          --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:
>
> 
> Who's the brainiac that put a link the group on C2C!? I might have 
to keep my group e-mail turned off, the temptation to do e-mail at work 
might be overwhelming! I need the job to pay for box junk! 
> 
> Frank-s

Do you not want us here? Ya know what happens when ya open up 
a "portal"!

{snicker}



                         

       
---------------------------------
Never miss a thing.   Make Yahoo your homepage.
